extendedInfo.description: Assists first class flight attendants by tracking passengers' food and drink requests, with names, color-coded status, and text notes. Requested and field tested by flight attendants, 118 supported aircraft, seating view and galley view. Provides standard meal, food, beverage, and mixed drink lists, that can be edited, added, and deleted.Tap the Menu key or button to select Galley, Seating, Configuration, or Help views.Supports First class, Business Elite, Business First, Business, Club World, Envoy, Executive, Executive First, and Upper Class seating for Airbus A319, A320, A321, A330, A380; Boeing 737, 747, 757, 767, 777; Bombardier CRJ; Embraer ERJ; and McDonnell Douglas DC-9, MD-80, MD-88, and MD-90. Supports Coach and Economy class on selected flights.To see the full list of supported aircraft, navigate to http://devoresoftware.blogspot.com/2011/09/aircraft.html . If your aircraft model isnât listed, let us know and we will add it in a future update.
